original_text: the men who brought up a bad report of the land—died by plague before the Lord.
korean_text: 곧 그 땅에 대하여 악평한 자들은 여호와 앞에서 재앙으로 죽었고

sentences.original_text: the men who brought up a bad report of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅에 대해 악평을 한 남자들은

sentences.original_text: died by plague before the Lord
